comment: use lead_name, med_name, and dep_name to insert the name of a cat with that rank
trigger_events: The war with o_c has begun.
Rising tensions have finally come to a breaking point, o_c has declared war against c_n.
After many moons of tensions between o_c and c_n, a formal war is declared by o_c's leader.
A tension-thick air hangs low over the o_c border, until o_c's leader finally declares a war with c_n.
A formal war with o_c was been declared by their leader, marking a major turning point in the two Clans' relationships.
Fuelled by a simmering resentment, o_c initiates a war with c_n, determined to reclaim their disputed territory.
Despite med_name's protests, o_c's leader declares war on c_n.

comment: a category is chosen randomly to affect the war once each moon.
but there are plenty of more complex/in-depth moon events that also affect the war.
rel_up: Rumors are circulating that o_c wishes the war would end.
o_c tires of the war, wishing for it to end.
Mutual exhaustion between o_c and c_n pushes o_c to consider ending the war.
Neither c_n nor o_c wishes to lose cats to the war; o_c seems to be considering peace.
Murmurings of peace between c_n and o_c permeated the last Gathering.
The other Clan leaders pushed o_c to make peace with c_n at the last Gathering.
Seeking peace, o_c ponders an end to the war.
In the midst of conflict, a spark of understanding flickers between o_c and c_n cats, hinting at a potential path to peace.
Amidst turmoil, empathy blooms between the c_n guardian and the o_c leader, kindling hope for reconciliation beyond the battlefield.
Among the Clans, a yearning for peace emerges, bridging divides and nurturing a shared hope for harmony.
Hope finally begins to unite the members of c_n and o_c, fostering a shared vision of peace.
At the half-moon meeting, med_name talks with o_c's medicine cat about ending the war.
neutral: War continues to rage between c_n and o_c.
c_n warriors plan new defence strategies for the war against o_c.
c_n wishes the war with o_c would end.
c_n cats reinforce the camp walls in anticipation of o_c attacks.
c_n warriors evaluate their defence strategies for coming battles against o_c.
The war with o_c is disrupting the daily lives of c_n members, forcing them to adapt to new routines and living situations in order to better defend themselves.
The cats of both Clans, o_c and c_n, don't know when or how to anticipate battles anymore, everything has just been developing into a haywire mess.
The Clans tried to have a calm negotiation about the conflict at the last Gathering, but it lead nowhere except to a waste of time.
Tension continues to hang thick over the two at-war Clans; o_c and c_n.
c_n patrols begin to bristle with anxiety and anticipation when patrolling the o_c border.
o_c recently lead out a surprise attack to claim c_n territory, but to no avail.
The war shows no signs of stopping, the hostility from o_c towards c_n is still going strong.
rel_down: o_c has taken some of c_n's territory.
War negotiations with o_c went badly at the last Gathering.
The tension between c_n and o_c is palpable, with even the smallest actions potentially leading to violence.
Any attempts at peace only seemed to make the whole war situation between c_n and o_c worse.
The cats of o_c are still keen on battle, with no yearn for peace shown from them.
lead_name is starting to worryingly notice how battles between o_c and c_n have been extremely aggressive recently.
Glares of unfriendliness and aggression are given by o_c's cats at most patrol interactions between c_n and o_c.
o_c's surprise attacks on c_n have been increasing significantly lately.
Even small sparks of disagreement between o_c and c_n can set off a huge battle.
o_c's cats can't stop themselves from instinctively unsheathing their claws upon encountering an c_n cat.

conclusion_events: The war with o_c has finally ended.
The cats of o_c finally agree to peace terms.
A truce is called by o_c and the war between o_c and c_n is ended.
With the many injuries both sides have suffered, o_c finally found common ground with c_n and ended the war.
The dust has finally settled of the war between o_c and c_n.
The leader of o_c has finally decided that for the wellbeing of both Clans, the war between o_c and c_n should come to an end now.
After lots of bloodshed of both o_c and c_n cats, o_c has come to terms of peace.
The battles between o_c and c_n have ceased, the war now finally coming to an end.
o_c and c_n have had a long and complex past, but it's time for their battles to come to an end.
Many battles have been fought between o_c and c_n, but it's time for those to stop now.
The cats of o_c have come to a realization that war isn't the best solution, deciding to end it now.
The piercing war cries of o_c have turned into tired, lifeless mewls... And the cats of o_c and c_n are glad as the war finally comes to a close.
The leader of o_c has come to terms about the war, deciding that it would best for all the cats of o_c and c_n if it was formally settled here.
Remembering all the blood that was shed in the war, o_c has decided to finally settle it, once and for all.
med_name could almost cry with relief when o_c's leader announces that they have agreed to peace terms.
